HomePage.title: Hello, I am Tzu-Yun Liang
HomePage.description: I am a software engineer and product designer<break></break>who loves delivering high-quality digital solutions.

AboutPage.title: about me
AboutPage.description: I enjoy collaborating with talented teams – including backend developers, UI/UX designers, and stakeholders – to bring top-notch software solutions to life.<break></break>With a diverse skill set in Next.js, React, TypeScript, UI/UX design, and API integration, I aim to contribute effectively. Additionally, I have honed my skills in information security, version control, and project management to ensure a smooth development process.
